spec_data.Name: perl-mixin
spec_data.Description:
Mixin inheritance is an alternative to the usual multiple-inheritance and
solves the problem of knowing which parent will be called. It also solves a
number of tricky problems like diamond inheritance.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:56:58 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Mixin inheritance, an alternative to multiple inheritance
